title: Overview of the resources available to support the winter vaccines programme | Public Health Scotland News
description: Viruses like flu and COVID-19 spread more easily during the colder months when we spend more time indoor with others. That’s why those most at risk of getting seriously ill are being offered the flu and COVID-19 vaccines. It’s important to encourage those who…

title: 4th avian flu outbreak this season confirmed in Niigata
description: This is the fourth outbreak of avian influenza at a poultry farm in Japan this season and the second confirmed case in Niigata.

title: Bearded Dragons – Salmonella
description: Describes an outbreak of Salmonella linked to pet bearded dragons and what pet owners can do.
